name: Telekineticats
description:
Made for the 2021 GMTK game jam

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Left click to shoot

How to play:

You control two cats that are connected telepathically  Getting shot by enemies will eventually break this connection   while you're connected you can shoot at enemies by using left click, and hitting enemies will increase your score   When you're connection breaks you will lose the ability to shoot enemies, and your cats will be able to take damage if one of your cat's health reaches zero you will lose. you can reconnect your cats by collecting hearts  a heart will spawn at a random spot whenever your connection is broken (sometimes it doesn't because it's bugged). Additionally the game speed is tied to how close together your cats are 

Sorry if it feels incomplete, I was on a road trip for the first half of the jam, and had to use a laptop that had a short battery life.
